scripts.prod: pm2 start server.js  && set NODE_ENV=production && set HOST
scripts.restart_prod: pm2 restart server.js  && set NODE_ENV=production && set HOST
scripts.update_db: set NODE_ENV=production && yarn sequelize-cli --env production db:migrate
scripts.start_prod_db: set NODE_ENV=production && yarn sequelize-cli --env production db:migrate && sequelize-cli --env production db:seed:all
